DOC.brief_summary: Diabetic retinopathy ( DR ) cause change blood vessel retina associate long-term Type 1 Type 2 diabetes mellitus . DR lead cause blindness United States . Standard optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) directly detect vascular change , may occur early affect passage blood tiny capillary ( reduce capillary flow ) cause great damage formation abnormal blood vessel growth ( neovascularization ) . Currently , fluorescein angiography ( FA ) gold standard detecting change , FA require injection dye vein arm patient . This dye cause undesirable side effect . Recently , OCT use make functional measurement ( total retinal blood flow among others ) perform angiography . Thus , functional OCT may provide useful , alternate way evaluate diabetic retinopathy .
